document.docAuthor: Ouvrard, David, Burckhardt, Daniel & Cocquempot, Christian
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the jumping plant-lice (Insecta: Hemiptera: Psylloidea) from the Mercantour National Park, with seven new records for France and one new synonymy

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the jumping plant-lice (Insecta: Hemiptera: Psylloidea) from the Mercantour National Park, with seven new records for France and one new synonymy

subSubSection.paragraph:

DISTRIBUTION. — Fauna Europaea: Belgium , France , Great Britain , Italy , Luxembourg , Spain , Switzerland ; INPN: no data; additional data from Psyl’list: Ireland , Slovenia , United States of America ( Connecticut ).

Conci et al. (1993)

L. ( Buxaceae ).
